title: I don't think I ever want to play All For One ever again
body:
http://imgur.com/epcXKzg


I've gotten annoyed at this game. I've gotten really irked. I've been a little salty sometimes, but this. This might be the first time in my 5 years I ever been truly angry. /dear diary

I don't know who I've pissed off lately, but this was just straight cancer.

http://imgur.com/gallery/mHVCmXe
